column4: ahhh. Could someone help me? My wireless is a little funky. Every time I try to connect with my network it connects and then my computer freezes
first... try to reproduce the problem with a livecd. Then check your RAM memory health.
that looks a severe hardware problem. In the livecd session, in the first screen there is a memory test availuable
no. You cannot do a memory health test with a regular operating system
